original_text:
He it is who makes the clouds rise at the end of the earth,
    who makes lightnings for the rain
    and brings forth the wind from his storehouses.
korean_text: 안개를 땅 끝에서 일으키시며 비를 위하여 번개를 만드시며 바람을 그 곳간에서 내시는도다

sentences.original_text: He it is who makes the clouds rise at the end of the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 땅 끝에서 구름이 솟아오르게 하시는 분이시며

sentences.original_text: who makes lightnings for the rain
and brings forth the wind from his storehouses.
